set(EASTL_PROJECT_DIR "${EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR}/EASTL")
set(EASTL_OUTPUT_DIR "${EXTERNAL_PROJECT_DIR}/lib/EASTL/${TORCH_PLATFORM_NAME}")

set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY ${EASTL_OUTPUT_DIR})
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_DEBUG ${EASTL_OUTPUT_DIR})
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELEASE ${EASTL_OUTPUT_DIR})
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_RELWITHDEBINFO ${EASTL_OUTPUT_DIR})
set(CMAKE_ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY_MINSIZEREL ${EASTL_OUTPUT_DIR})

UpdateExternalLib("EASTL" "https://github.com/electronicarts/EASTL.git" "2a482309a35907cb09d261340a14b28651fc0ffe" "" "" need_patch)

set(SKIP_INSTALL_ALL ON CACHE BOOL "" FORCE)
set(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH CACHE STRING "${EASTL_OUTPUT_DIR}" FORCE)

add_subdirectory(${EASTL_PROJECT_DIR} "${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/EASTL")

set_target_properties(EASTL PROPERTIES FOLDER "External/EASTL")
